Package ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.io.watch

package ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.io.watch
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.io
     
    ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.io.resource
     
  • Class
    Description
    FileWatcher<R extends Report>
    An abstract class that monitors a specific file for changes such as creation, modification, and deletion.
    InspectingFileWatcher
    The InspectingFileWatcher class extends the FileWatcher to monitor a specific file for changes, including creation, modification, and deletion events.
    InspectingFileWatcher.AbstractReport
    An abstract implementation of the Report interface that provides common fields and methods for different types of file event reports.
    InspectingFileWatcher.CreateReport
    A report representing a file creation event.
    InspectingFileWatcher.DeleteReport
    A report representing a file deletion event.
    InspectingFileWatcher.ModifyReport
    A report representing a file modification event.
    Report
    The Report interface represents a file system event report generated by the FileWatcher.
    Report.Type
    The Type enum represents the different kinds of file system events that can be reported.
